name: Cookie Quality Assurance Training Program (Exhausting Games Jam)
name_original: Cookie Quality Assurance Training Program (Exhausting Games Jam)
description:
Welcome to the Cookie Quality Assurance Training Program.

You will have the experience of simulating a work shift (8am to 6pm) in the cookies quality control area.

You must see the cookies on the conveyor belt and check if they have any defects.

At the end of the day, you must answer how many cookies were defective.

Features:
  1. Realistic day & night cycle (+ bonus: a 100% functional digital clock)
  2. Realistic movement system
  3. 8 hours of full gameplay
  4. Ambient Occlusion
  5. 2 unique factory whistle sound effects
